Package inra.ijpb.data.border

Class ConstantBorder

java.lang.Object
inra.ijpb.data.border.ConstantBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
BorderManager
public class ConstantBorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements BorderManager
Returns either image pixel when position is inside image bounds, or a constant value when position is outside of image bounds.
Author:
David Legland
